name: (TRL) Tiny Robot Laser
description:
Controls: 

WASD - move

J, K, L - shoot

you must go to the other side of the level (the so right, to the border)

Some evil organic tank wants to destroy the planet, so the scientists have develop in a rush, a tiny robot that can shoot tiny balls, grenades and a laser, but it's power it is a little limited so destroying boxes and collecting coins (there's evil coins) can help

This is a game for a gamejam, and if you don't like the music and/or sounds, i'm sorry but i was a little rushed and it's my first jam in all time
